LanguageData.DoorPowered.label: Powered door
LanguageData.DoorPowered.description: Seals rooms apart. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down.
LanguageData.DoorSimple.label: Simple door
LanguageData.DoorSimple.description: Seals rooms apart. Must be manually opened and closed, which slows people down.
LanguageData.WallMetal.label: Metal wall
LanguageData.WallMetal.description: A metal wall with a built-in power conduit.
LanguageData.WallStone.label: Stone wall
LanguageData.WallStone.description: A stone wall. It could stand for ages. It doesn't burn or transmit power.
LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: Power conduit
LanguageData.Sandbags.label: Sandbags
